search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for EZ Texting (ez-texting.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for EZ Texting is: https://www.eztexting.com/pricing .

![Image 1: Canadian flag](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/content_images/Flag-of-Canada-1.svg)

Key Factors That Influence SMS Marketing Pricing 
-------------------------------------------------

![Image 2: Volume of Messages](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/volume-of-messages-icon.svg)

### Volume of Messages

Typically, the number of text messages you plan to send directly affects the cost of text marketing. At EZ Texting, each plan comes with 500 credits, plus the option to purchase additional credits a la carte or through volume upgrades at a discounted rate.

![Image 3: Messaging Type: SMS vs MMS](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/2024-05/pricing-sms-vs-mms-icon.svg)

### Messaging Type: SMS vs MMS

Leverage SMS, a text-only messaging service limited to 160 characters, or MMS for multimedia content and longer messages. Our MMS includes access to millions of images and an image editing tool powered by Shutterstock.

![Image 4: Number of Contacts](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/2024-05/pricing-contacts-icon.svg)

### Number of Contacts

While having a large audience is beneficial, engaging and connecting effectively with your audience is crucial to building trust and loyalty. Our plans can be scaled to your needs based on the size of your audience. Each plan comes with access to uploading unlimited contacts.

![Image 5: Additional Features Integrations](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/2024-05/pricing-features-and-integrations-icon.svg)

### Additional Features & Integrations

Use customer list growth tools, including Keywords, QR Codes, and Sign-up forms, to quickly boost the size of your target audience. We also offer seamless integrations with popular CRM, email marketing, and e-commerce platforms, enabling you to streamline and automate text campaigns effortlessly.

Getting Started with Your Text Marketing Campaign
-------------------------------------------------

Steps to Launch a Successful Text Marketing Strategy

### Step 1 Secure a Trusted Number

Ensure credibility and reliability in reaching your audience, fostering trust, and increasing the likelihood of engagement with your messages through trusted textable number options:

*   Local Number
*   Dedicated Short Code
*   High-Volume A2P
*   Managed Accounts
*   10DLC
*   Toll-Free Number
*   Text-Enabled Landline

### Step 2 Build Attentive Audiences

Leverage customizable opt-in tools and segmentation features, ensuring that messages are delivered to a receptive audience interested in their offerings, thus maximizing engagement and conversion potential:

*   Sign-Up Forms
*   QR Code Generator
*   List Uploads
*   Double Opt-In
*   Opt-Outs
*   Generative AI
*   Integrations

### Step 3 Craft Texts That Deliver

Manage and deliver impactful messages using a user-friendly interface, scheduling options, and analytics tools, guaranteeing optimized engagement and conversion rates:

*   Mass Texts
*   Two-Way Texts
*   SMS & MMS
*   Text Templates
*   Keywords
*   AI Compose
*   Team Inbox

How is SMS Marketing Pricing Calculated?
----------------------------------------

Instead of charging your business per text, each EZ Texting plan comes with 500 credits, plus the option to purchase additional credits a la carte or through volume upgrades at a discounted rate.

![Image 6: send SMS texts for one credit](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/2024-05/pricing-sms-one-credit%402x.png)

### SMS

**1 Credit** for each message sent to each contact

![Image 7: send MMS texts for three credits](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/2024-05/pricing-mms-three-credits%402x.png)

### MMS

**3 Credits** for each message sent to each contact

### Pay-Per-Message Plans

One SMS text to one contact costs one credit, while one MMS message to one contact costs three credits. Credits are our currency to measure each message you send to each contact.

### Subscription-Based Plans

Subscribe to cost-effective Monthly Plans, or you can subscribe to an Annual Plan and get up to 20% cost savings with scalable SMS marketing solutions to engage your audience effectively.

Choosing the Right SMS Marketing Service
----------------------------------------

Not all SMS marketing services are created equal, and choosing the right SMS service is critical to success in your texting journey.

![Image 8: industry-leading SMS marketing delivery rates](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/reliability-and-compliance-icon.svg)

### Reliability & Compliance

Rely on our industry-leading delivery rates and consistent adherence to legal regulations to protect your brand’s reputation and customer trust.

![Image 9: cost-effective SMS messaging tools](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/feature-set-icon.svg)

### Feature Set & Scalability

EZ Texting offers versatile tools and the capacity to adapt to increasing messaging needs, enabling effective and expansive outreach strategies as your business expands.

![Image 10: cost-effective SMS marketing solutions](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/cost-effectiveness-roi-icon.svg)

### Cost-Effectiveness & ROI

Our affordable pricing plans, efficient campaign management tools, and analytics to measure performance empower you to optimize your SMS marketing strategies and achieve higher engagement and conversion rates without overspending.

Our Customers Love Us. The Feeling is Mutual
--------------------------------------------

Redefine success with text messaging solutions for every business category.

### Great Service

Great service! We like the ease of use, affordable price, and the many features offered to assist in running a business and communication. I love all aspects of EZ Texting.

Keith B

Small Business Owner

### EZ Texting is a huge time saver

We are very impressed with how easy it is to send out messages to our entire company. Our agents love it because they can quickly see and respond to message(s). The pricing is perfect for our business size.

Jacquelyn B

Executive Real Estate Broker Assistant

### Excellent resource!

We were looking for a cost effective way to set up texting campaigns. After looking at many we chose EZ Texting and are glad we did. The price was great. The service worked flawlessly.

Darvie F

Pastor

![Image 11: Integrations](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/Icon-Integrations-Full.svg)

![Image 12: Integrations-lhalf-a](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/Icon-Integrations-Half_A.svg)

Powerful Integrations    
at Your Fingertips
--------------------------------------------

![Image 13: Integrations-lhalf-b](https://www.eztexting.com/sites/default/files/new-site/icons/Icon-Integrations-Half_B.svg)

We've partnered with top software companies so you can easily connect with the apps you already use to drive your business, including popular services like SalesForce, HubSpot, Squarespace, Shutterstock, Transcend, Zapier, and Zendesk.

LEARN MORE[](https://www.eztexting.com/features/integrations)

Discover affordable SMS marketing pricing plans tailored to your business needs. Boost your ROI with our cost-effective texting solutions from EZ texting!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes credits for SMS and MMS messages, with overage charges and telecom fees applicable.
